name: Wany.Chat
author: wanychat

sections.description:
Wany.Chat is a plugin that creates a fully functional selling Chatbot from your WooCommerce store.
Supports WooCommerce shipping methods and payments via Robokassa and Mercado Pago
Connect it using ManyChat platform or directly via Facebook

Chatbot works in Facebook Messenger and Instagram DM

  • Lists your products and product categories
  • Displays products info: photos, prices, attributes (sizes, colors, etc) with respect to current stock
  • Enables cart and order checkout process directly in Messenger and Instagram
  • Notifies human agents on questions and help requests from customers
  • Sends promotional messages to engage and re-engage visitors

Why do you need it?

  • Facebook Messenger and Instagram DM are the new channels to get customers from and re-engage with them
  • You’ve already set up a WooCommerce store. Why not making a chatbot from it, right?
  • Be closer to you customers. Chat with them directly while leaving routine interaction to the bot
  • Remind about yourself for FREE. Facebook Messenger and Instagram DM let you send promo messages inside 24-hour window after each interaction initiated by customer
  • Remind about yourself using Facebook Paid Messages. Address your audience. This proves to be much more cost-effective comparing to Ads

1.3.16.6

  • Fix – Minor bug fixes
  • Add – Added link to MC livechat for notifications using MC flow

1.3.16.3

  • Add – Added price printing using WooCommerce settings, including decimals, separators and currency signs

  • Add – Misc interface enhancements

  • Add – Added payments via Robokassa
  • Add – Added notifications via ManyChat flow
  • Add – Added support for multisite WordPress installations
  • Add – Added support for .webp images format

1.3.14.1

  • Fix – Fixed some errors with Instagram messaging

1.3.13.4

  • Dev – Added debugging features

1.3.12.4

  • Add – Added French and Arabic languages
  • Add – Added support for right-to-left languages
  • Add – Added setting to show both Buy and Open buttons in product list

1.3.11.13

  • Fix – Fixed app-plugin connection process for some cases

1.3.11.10

  • Fix – Fixed minor bugs and PHP 8.1 compatibility issues

1.3.11.3

  • Add – Added settings to suppress related products and recommended products messages

1.3.11.2

  • Add – Added order JSON output to use in ManyChat flows

1.3.11.1

  • Add – Added ability to configure existing or add new fields on checkout

  • Edit – Added Mercado Pago payment method (beta)

1.3.10.1

  • Add – Added Mercado Pago payment method (beta)

1.3.9.1

  • Add – Added ability in bot to display and choose shipping methods from WooCommerce settings

1.3.8.2

  • Add – Added Portuguese language

1.3.8.0

Dev – Optimization

  • Add – Added redirect on Place Order with pre-filled contact info
  • Update – Reorganized labels on buttons

  • Add – (beta) Added ability to add and set variants of shipping and payment using hooks

  • Dev – Misc

  • Add – Added setting: what contact info bot will ask during checkout (phone, email, state, city, postcode)

  • Add – Added user-customizable translation tool

1.3.3.2

  • Add – Add remarketing tools for products opened in web from messenger

  • Add – Added hide for COD for web-checkout

  • Add – Added html strip and shortening for product description

  • Dev – Misc

1.3.1.6

  • Add – Added “Categories Slugs” parameter to Wany.Chat action “List Categories”
  • Add – Added an option for redirect to website from bot
  • Add – Added ignoring from adding bot dummy emails to mailpoet
  • Add – Added filter wany_get_product_description

1.3.1.3

  • Add – Added Italian language

1.3.1.1

  • Add – Added connection to ManyChat accounts that were created from IG accounts first

1.2.26.9

short_description: Wany.Chat turns your WooCommerce store into Selling Chatbot. Ready for Facebook Messenger and Instagram DM. Can be used inside ManyChat platform
